Neither program could easily be uninstalled, and they created vulnerabilities that were exploited by un...

links.description: Rechtsstaat is a doctrine in continental European legal thinking, originating in German jurisprudence.  It can be translated into English as "rule of law", alternatively "legal state", "state of law", "state of justice", "state of rights", or "state based on justice and integrity".[1]
